summary: Dumping My Crypto Mind - I finally made a website after 10 years of being in crypto and for good reason. I’ve been involved in the XX Network for over half of that time now and thought it was about time to share what lurks in my aging grey matter for others to soak up. Follow me on X and enjoy browsing the site. Don’t forget the separate menu sections for extra detail if you’d like to disappear down the XX rabbit hole!
